title: Khloe Kardashian shares a kiss with her daughter True... as ex Tristan Thompson comments approvingly
text:
Khloé Kardashian shared a sweet photo of herself and her daughter True Thompson on Instagram on Sunday night.

The 35–year–old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star shared a quick peck on the lips with her one–year–old daughter in the sweet snap.

The photo even got the attention of Khloé's ex Tristan Thompson, 28, who shared his support in the comments.

Too cute! Khloé Kardashian, 35, shared a quick peck on the lips with her one–year–old daughter True Thompson in the sweet snap posted Sunday on Instagram

A visibly sunburned Khloé was pictured with True in front of a swath of palm trees near a tropical beach.

The reality star had her dyed blonde tresses styled in two thick cornrow braids, and she wore two gold necklaces around her throat.

She pouted her lips to give little True a little peck on the lips.

Her daughter was dressed in a cute powder blue dress with white floral trim, and True's short dark locks were styled in multiple buns.

He's a fan: Her cheating ex Tristan Thompson, 28, commented approvingly on the post with two heart emojis

'The Love of my life!!!!' Khloé wrote enthusiastically in her caption.

Khloé didn't specify when or where the photo was taken, but she sported similar braids to the corn rows she wore during a girls' trip to the Turks and Caicos Islands featured on Sunday night's episode of KUWTK.

The image elicited multiple positive reactions from her celebrity friends and followers, but one commenter was a bit of a surprise: her ex partner Tristan Thompson.

The Cleveland Cavaliers player kept his response minimal, only sharing two heart emojis in response to the mother–daughter smooch.

Bonding time: 'The Love of my life!!!!' Khloé wrote enthusiastically in her caption

Ancient history: True was born in April 2018, following a pregnancy marred by Tristan's cheating scandals. Khloé kicked him to the curb after he made out with her sister Kylie Jenner's best friend Jordyn Woods at a party

Tristan has periodically weighed in on social media about posts involving his daughter.

He and Khloé struck up a relationship in 2016, and the couple welcomed True last spring.

The reality star's pregnancy was marked by turmoil, as her athlete partner was alleged to have cheated on her with multiple women during the relationship.

Despite the conflict, and her acknowledgement of the infidelities, Khloé stayed by her man and gave True his last name.

But Tristan struck a fatal blow to their already delicate union when he made out with Kylie Jenner's best friend Jordyn Woods at a house party in February of this year.

The betrayal with her youngest sister's BFF was the final straw, and the couple split shortly thereafter.

Daddy time: Late last month, Tristan got in some father–daughter bonding time with True as the two visited Universal Studios Hollywood for the day

In the loop: Her dad was in contact with his ex during the outing, and True even FaceTimed with her mother during a slow moment at the amusement park

Late last month, Tristan got in some father–daughter bonding time with True as the two visited Universal Studios Hollywood for the day.

Her dad was in contact with his ex during the outing, and True even FaceTimed with her mother during a slow moment at the amusement park.

Earlier this month, Khloé vowed that she would never come between her ex's relationship with their daughter during an appearance on the On Purpose podcast with Jay Shetty.

The statement came weeks after a source told People that the Good American co-founder has been considering getting back together with Tristan.

'Tristan has showed more of an interest. He seems to want more than co-parent with Khloe. It seems Khloe has moments when she is toying with the idea of getting back with Tristan,' they said.
description: Khloé Kardashian shared a sweet photo of her giving her daughter True a quick peck on the lips. The photo received supportive comments, including one from her ex Tristan Thompson.
